column2: I CAN SEE YOU! I'll PUTTING UP GREEN SMOKE. OVER.
Survivors on board, HEADING FOR HOME PLATE. OVER.
THERE ARE NO SURVIVORS ON THE GROUND. EVERYBODY IS... DEAD. WE ARE RTB. OVER.
SURVIVORS ARE GETTING MEDICAL ATTENTION. GOOD JOB EVERYONE. HOOYAH!
BRING OUR BOYS BACK HOME. GOOD LUCK WITH THE MISSION. OVER.
